attributes.action: Hold the next General Election on 2nd May 2024
attributes.additional_details: So many people throughout the UK are crying out to remove the current Government. We want the next General Election to be held on 2nd May 2024, the same day as the next Local Elections. We believe waiting until Autumn 2024 will be ridiculous, and could mean the General Election would be near to the US Elections which risks very unhelpful distractions. We think delaying even longer to January 2025 is inconceivable. General Election on 2nd May 2024 please.
attributes.background: So many people throughout the UK want a General Election. We think this should be held on 2nd May 2024. Don’t wait until Autumn 2024 or beyond.
